name: Single KB Cardio Complex (@Asgooch)
description: The ultimate single-bell cardio complex from @Asgooch. Row → Clean → Squat → Snatch, 6 reps each, both sides, 5 rounds. One lighter kettlebell is all you need — he used 24kg.

exercises.notes: Left hand. Core braced, hips back, extend fully each rep.
Left hand. Hip drive into front rack, thumb on collarbone.
Left rack. Drop low, chest up, extend through quads.
Left hand. Explosive hips, punch to sky, don't bang the forearm.
Right hand. Same form — extend fully, hips back.
Right hand. Smooth clean to rack.
Right rack. Full depth, chest proud.
Right hand. Last exercise — empty the tank.

tips: Use a LIGHTER kettlebell — this is cardio, not strength. @Asgooch used 24kg.
No rest between exercises or between sides — left flows straight into right
60 seconds rest between rounds (after both sides are done)
If you're breathing heavy, you're doing it right
5 rounds total — 48 reps per side per round, 480 reps total
Great benchmark workout — track your rest times and try to reduce them
